_comments.images: Gallery slideshow: array of image URLs shown on the FAQ section (strings).
_comments.laborPrice: Cost estimator: fixed labour / call-out fee in GBP (number). Shown as 'Labour (call-out)' and used in the total.
_comments.prices: Price list and calculator: all values in GBP. punctureRepair, pricePerTyre, priceBalance, lockingWheelNutRemoval, jumpStart.
_comments.telegramBotToken: SERVER-ONLY: Telegram bot token from @BotFather. Do not expose this file to the client if it contains the token.
_comments.telegramChatIds: SERVER-ONLY: Array of up to 5 Telegram chat IDs to receive quote notifications. Empty strings are skipped.
